title: Fun Width Dick and Jane (2005)
description:
Fun Width Dick and Jane (2005)
------------------------------
"Giving Big Businesses a Run For Their Money!"

IMDB: <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0369441/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0369441/</a>

Audio: English, Czech, Hungarian, Polish

Subs: Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Icelandic, Hungarian, Lithuanian, Polish, Serbian, Turkish, Slovene, Romanian, Hindi, Hebrew, English, Czech, Bulgarian, Greek, Estonian, Croatian, Arabic.
Subs for hearing-disabled: English

Extra Materials:
- Gag Reel.
- Press Junket Highlights.
- Filmmakers Commentary.
- Deleted Scenes.
- Previews.


Plot outline:
The day before Globodyne&#039;s stock tanks, a la Enron, and its pension fund evaporates, the corporation&#039;s CEO and CFO set up middle manager Dick Harper to be the public face of the disaster. Jobless, and with no savings, pension, or home equity, Dick and his wife Jane sink slowly into poverty. He looks for work (as do all former Globodyne executives); he even tries day labor with the relatives of their Mexican nanny. A foreclosure notice sends Dick and Jane over the edge into a life of blue-collar crime. Then, as things finally look up, the report of an looming indictment pushes Dick and Jane toward a denouement with the real criminals, the white-collar guys.
